White House Conference on Highway Safety
General Services Building
Washington 25, D. C.
February 5, 1954
Dr. Harry Skornia
Executive Director
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
FEB 10 J954
i
Dear Dr* Skornia:
Mr* Seymour N* Siegel, director of the City of
New York Municipal Broadcasting System, has suggested
that the National Association of Educational Broad¬
casters may want to participate in the nationwide
program which is being launched this month by the
White House Conference on Highway Safety*
In order that you may know the background and
purposes of the Conference, I am sending, under
separate cover, some informational material which
we have issued.
When you have had a chance to look it over, will
you let me know, please, whether you agree that this
would be a very worth while part of your broadcast¬
ing activities?
AH good wishes
Sincerely,
Conference Director
